about_the_game:
The Challenge DLC

The Challenge DLC is The Croaker's second DLC,
featuring 15 additional challenges on top
of the 2 available in the Challenge Mode's demo from the base game.

All Challenges:

  • Torture (Every time you jump, there's a 10% chance that it will kill you)

  • Why (The games speed randomly changes)

  • Reverse Jump (Every time you jump, the player's direction is reversed)

  • Spike Head Plus (Adds more spike heads to the level)

  • Upside Down (Makes the camera upside down)

  • Concoction (Mixture of More Spikes and Darkness)

  • The Final Boss (Mixture of Icy Tiles, Reverse Jump, and Reduced Jumps)

  • More Spikes (Adds a ton more spikes)

  • Darkness (Makes the whole level dark)

  • Time Limit (Beat the level in less than 100,000 milliseconds)

  • Rising Lava (The void rises slowly)

  • Ice Mode (Makes everything ice)

  • Reverse Controls (Self-explanatory)

  • Broken Speed (Every second your speed is randomized from 0.5x to 2x)

  • Unfun Game (Every 5 seconds, the player's direction is flipped)

There's more:

  • 1,500 apples granted on purchase

  • A New Achievement Pack: Complete the challenges to earn achievements for more apples

  • New variant of Mask Dude: "Challenger"

  • New challenges every month!
